alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Lee; Monroe; Pontotoc; Prentiss; Tishomingo; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 7:37PM CDT until July 18 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Pontotoc County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Union County in northeastern Mississippi... Itawamba County in northeastern Mississippi... Lee County in northeastern Mississippi... Northeastern Monroe County in northeastern Mississippi... Southern Tishomingo County in northeastern Mississippi... Prentiss County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 737 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Leedy to near New Harmony, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tupelo, Booneville, Fulton, Baldwyn, Red Bay, Tombigbee State Park, Tishomingo State Park, Saltillo, Guntown, Belmont, Plantersville, Mantachie, Smithville, Tremont, Tishomingo, Fairview, New Harmony, Pratts Friendship, Burton and New Salem. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Itawamba; Lee; Monroe; Pontotoc; Prentiss; Tishomingo; Union
